General.Name: Nitori Holdings Co. Ltd
General.Description: Nitori Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the retail of furniture and interior products in Japan. It is involved in the real estate leasing; advertising; logistics; and other activities. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
